titleStmt.title: The light upon the candlestick serving for observation of the principal things in the book called, The mysteries of the kingdom of God, &c., against several professors / treated of, and written by Will. Ames ; printed in Low-Dutch for the author, 1662, and translated into English by B.F.
Lucerna super candelabrum. English.
titleStmt.author: Ames, William, d. 1662.
B. F.

notesStmt.note: Erroneously ascribed to William Ames. Cf. Smith, J. Friends' books.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
